an extension to see how it compares. The network therefore outputs a three-dimensional vector
with the same structure as the input, with the dimensions [samples, timesteps, features].
There is a single feature, the daily total power consumed, and there are always seven features.
A single one-week prediction will therefore have the size: [1, 7, 1]. Therefore, when training
